data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Amreli, Gujarat, India.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Amreli, Gujarat, India

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Amreli, Gujarat, India.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the county of Amreli to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 16,656 believers in Amreli, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Patni Jamat people. Make the Patni Jamat people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, sanctify the 16,656 believers in Amreli and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the county of Amreli.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Amreli, Gujarat, India.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

location.name: Amreli
location.people_groups_list: Yadav Golarana, Kharva (Muslim traditions), Siddi (Muslim traditions), Gavri, Lohana
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Yadav Golarana (900), Kharva (Muslim traditions) (700), Siddi (Muslim traditions) (13,000), Gavri (1,000), Lohana (580,000)
